title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 25 May 2015 - XWiki
content:
<fwiesing> cjd: are you still online? it seems to me  
01:46 <fwiesing> short information and what I found out  
01:56 <fwiesing> and it's working now - but details tomorrow. I leave.

14:04 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:10 <fwiesing> cjd: Hello!  
14:11 <fwiesing> As I told yesterday evening - I got it working - and I did this morning some analyzes - is it interesting for you?  
14:11 <fwiesing> Here a link with some informations and screenshots  
14:11 <fwiesing> https://www.roadrunnerserver.com/oc/public.php?service=files&t=872148d3c9700a5c6b6cfd67bebd2400  
14:12 <fwiesing> I installed the release 7.0.1 with mysql on the same virutal machine as I try to do it before with pgsql - and I got it running within 15 - 20 min  
14:12 <fwiesing> ... without any problem.  
14:13 <fwiesing> while I tested - I came to the conclusion, that it must be somewhere in the databaseconnection to the psql  
14:14 <fwiesing> I reinstalled this morning the xwiki - 7.0.1 on the other machine (with debian 7) - I uninstalled everything and installed it new with the apt-get command (like I did with the MySQL-installation).  
14:15 <fwiesing> I created the database new while the setup-procedure  
14:15 <fwiesing> (like I did with MySQL).  
14:16 <fwiesing> In the file you will see 2 screenshots - I think the rights, while created during the setup-procedure are not really working. However - I changed them later.  
14:17 <fwiesing> I tried to start the service - but the same error as yesterday posted.  
14:18 <fwiesing> Then - I analyzed the connection and tried different settings - you can see this in the hibernate-files I loaded up.  
14:19 <fwiesing> Then I tested with the commandline - and I was successful to connect with the user xwiki to the database xwiki (you can see this in the attached test-protocoll).  
14:19 <fwiesing> further - I was able to create a database - but with exactly the same users in the hibernate.cfg.xml it didn't work.  
14:20 <fwiesing> ... this what I found out.  
14:21 <fwiesing> I was unable to get it working with the postgresql-server. (the jdbc41-driver is installed in the WEB-INF/lib - and set to mode 777)  
14:22 <fwiesing> that's all - and thx for help yesterday. The hint with the .zip was helpful, because I was able to see the differences.  
15:01 <fwiesing> AFK
